title: Effective Questioning in a Classroom Discussion(TEFC)
creator_credit: Peter Oyston and University of Lancaster (Microteaching Research Unit)
brief_description: The course is essentially self instructional and designed to encourage self diagnosis. It aims to produce measurable improvements in questioning techniques and thus to reduce teacher talk and increase pupil participation
